thread.title: Dove redefines the meaning of beauty in 60 seconds
thread.title_full: Dove redefines the meaning of beauty in 60 seconds

author: mtan
title: Dove redefines the meaning of beauty in 60 seconds
text:
12:00 PM February 01, 2017 
Why do we search the universe for just one type of beauty? 
The truth of the matter is that every woman has a potential for beauty. And for decades now, around the globe, Dove has been encouraging and inspiring women to believe this, and to see their own potential. 
This 2017, Dove Philippines is bringing this philosophy of Real Beauty closer to home through an extensive campaign that celebrates all types of beauty. Beauty comes in all shapes, sizes, colors, ages, and personalities, after all. ADVERTISEMENT 
Through a film that features an exceptional and diverse group of women, Dove brings to life the the Real Beauty is Universal campaign by highlighting each woman’s unique beauty. 
One need not be endowed with beauty queen curves, have a model-esque figure, or possess a perky cheerleader’s wide toothy smile. Dove goes beyond stereotypes to redefine beauty by showing that it can be different and unique, and most definitely, Universal. 
There’s no need to search for just one type of beauty. Go ahead, and celebrate your own unique beauty, and all types of beauty with Dove. #RealBeauty is universal , after all. 
ADVT
